sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { EventServiceService } from 'src/app/services/event/event-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-event', templateUrl: './event.component.html', styleUrls: ['./event.component.css'] }) export class EventComponent implements OnInit { events : any[] = []; constructor(private eventservice : EventServiceService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.getAll(); } getAll(){ this.eventservice.FindAllEvents().subscribe({ next : (response) => { this.events = response.event console.log(this.events) }, error : (err) => console.log(err) }); } } Évènements Sportifs
